contextInfo.title: Editing individual Student or Teacher Accounts

content.code:
To edit an individual Student or Teacher account:

  1. Find the name of the Teacher or Student you need to edit in the list of accounts and click on their name.
  2. You'll then be able to overwrite any of their information as needed.
  3. Once you've made the changes, click on the Save Changes button.
